Title: Scipione l'africano
Writer: Carmine Gallone (story), Camillo Mariani Dell'Aguillara (story), Sebastiano A. Luciani (story), Carmine Gallone (screenplay), Camillo Mariani Dell'Aguillara (screenplay), Sebastiano A. Luciani (screenplay)
Actors: Annibale Ninchi, Camillo Pilotto, Fosco Giachetti, Francesca Braggiotti
Plot: A story of the Second Punic Wars, beginning with Scipio's futile pleas to the Roman Senate to build an army to battle Hannibal, that climaxes with the battle of Zama.
